metadata.title: CVE-2020-1712 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap use-after-free vulnerability was found in systemd before version v245-rc1, where asynchronous Polkit queries are performed while handling dbus messages. A local unprivileged attacker can abuse this flaw to crash systemd services or potentially execute code and elevate their privileges, by sending specially crafted dbus messages.

criterions.comment: systemd package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '244.1-0ubuntu3').
